website_summaries.verdict: An all-around healthy flake food for goldfish of all breeds and sizes that is as easy to feed as it is for them to digest. It helps that goldfish absolutely love the taste too.
pros: Fish meal is the first ingredient
Fortified with vitamins, minerals, and trace elements
cons: These flakes are on the larger side, but breaking them down for small goldfish is as easy as pinching your fingers together

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: We used to use Aqueon Goldfish food but purchased the Tetra Goldfish flakes while on Amazon one day. Tetra clearly advertises this is their Clear Water Formula. Never has the water been so cloudy as it has since switching to this food by Tetra. In fact, within 2 days after cleaning the tank and replacing the filter and going through about 4 feeding sessions the tank is again cloudy to the point of the fish nearly disappearing. Very disappointed in this product, especially when it boasts on the label it is the Clear Water Formula. We will be returning to the product by Aqueon.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: The Goldfish Flake is their favorite snack in the morning and evening
customer_reviews.text: I have a few dozens of goldfish in a small pond. They have been surviving last five years, producing offsprings, without me feeding them. The Goldfish Flake is their favorite snack in the morning and evening. They’ve become so trained by now that when I open the patio door they just show up with their mouths open bubbling tiny bubbles. They just clean it up when I sprinkle a couple of spoonfuls. After gobbling up any floating flakes, they are digging it up for any sunken bits with their fins wagging cutely. It’s a peaceful scene those pretty fish enjoying their snack. I’ve been feeding the flake last five years, and happy with it as much as those fish are.
customer_reviews.author: c-sohn

customer_reviews.title: Balanced diet for happy fish
customer_reviews.text: Almost 6 years ago, i purchased 3 gold fish from the bulk tank at the petstore for 20 cents a piece and they have been eating this food exclusively the entire time. Still going strong and healthy. Keep your tank clean, aerated, and feed your fish appropriate amounts at normal intervals and they will last you just as long. Its a myth that petstore gold fish die after the first weekend. Give them what they need for life and they will live happily.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Keeps well, no waste
customer_reviews.text: My outdoor goldfish do great on this food. Being outside, I don’t feed them at all in winter, since their metabolism slows down; they make do with what grows in the pond until spring. If I don’t get to use up the entire container of this food, it’s okay because the food will still be just as fresh when hand feeding resumes in spring, therefore I get this product by the bucket and there is never any waste, so it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James C. James

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Still kicking myself for not searching out this product long ago. I bet for more than a year, maybe two I've bought little sacks of it at the pet shop. The average bag, small bag cost me $10-$11 but FAR more than what you get int he Tetra cans for $11 so I kept comparing it to that. BUT geeze, you can fill up one of those $11 cans 5 or 6, maybe 7 times with what's in this bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Warren B. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Koi and goldfish love this!
customer_reviews.text: I don't generally feed my koi and goldfish through the winter months and reorder this food in the spring so it is fresh for the summer months. This winter was so mild, my pond never froze over and I ran out of food in January. They have been eating daily eve since and I bough this larger size to last the season and hopefully into next Spring. I have tried other fish and koi food and this is the only one they will eat.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Good value and my fishes like it
customer_reviews.text: I took one stars off because it doesn’t give clean and clear water as the advertisement states. However it doesn’t brother me much since I need to change water every 2-3 days anyway. Overall I’m still happy with this product because it’s good value. I was nervous at the beginning because some reviewers states that their fishes died after eating it. I’m glad that my fishes didn’t die. They didn’t eat much for the first two days but they love it now. I will order it again once my fishes finish it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love  the  smell!
customer_reviews.text: I had been feeding my goldfish the Top Fin brand of goldfish flake food and it smelled strongly of Krill, almost to the point of me having to clean the tank out every 2 weeks. I opened up the Tetra Min brand of goldfish flake food and it was like smelling a good fresh fried fish dinner! I have raised several goldfish on the Tetra brand products.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Pulverized fish food
customer_reviews.text: I have usually been purchasing the smaller container of this food. I decided to try and get more for my buck so I purchased the large container to refill my empties. When it arrived I opened the tube to only be disappointed because there were no large flake the entire tube was pulverized almost to powder. I’m not sure how but my thinking is it experienced rough handling from either the warehouse or shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Basic fish food for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say much for the flavor, but the fish seem to really like it, so it probably tastes good! This looks like the same basic fish food that I've always seen, so I can't say much about it, good or bad, other than that it seems to be keeping the fish fed. I did like that I was able to get a bulk size at this price. It was a lot cheaper than buying fish food from the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainBlackton

customer_reviews.title: This is the best choice for me in this price range
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like about the packaging is the inside bag needs to be cut open and cannot be resealed, but I scoop the content into smaller boxes for daily feeding and I can use the bucket for cleaning and storage of small items or transporting my fish. The fish love it and I hope it is healthy enough for them. It does tint the water in the aquarium reddish.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow that's a lot of fish food!
customer_reviews.text: I've got 6 goldfish and 2 catfish in a tank and they get fed twice a day. It's still going to take years to get through this bucket of food. You'll definitely want to use a smaller container for daily feedings and use the bucket for refilling. The bucket seals excellently so you can keep the food fresh for as long as possible. You'll be saving lots of $$ this way though. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: it seems fine
customer_reviews.text: I don't actually love this. I've never even tasted it. The fish seem to eat it and not die.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Skink

customer_reviews.title: Sinking!!
customer_reviews.text: People keep talking about how flakes are a fave for the ranchu goldfish, but that they're bad for them because they float on top, causing the fishies to gulp in too much air, leading to swim bladder problems. NOT with these! My babies and I love these flakes because they're super yummy (according to them) and they sink to the bottom!!
customer_reviews.author: MiniPanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Pond's Goldfish
customer_reviews.text: I can 't really say anything about how it tastes, but I've been using this for almost a year now and have had no issues with either my pond's filter or fish dying. The auto-delivery is great, as it comes just before I run out of my previous supply. I looked at a local fish store and there were selling this for over $10, so this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic G

customer_reviews.title: GINORMOUS tub of fish food for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This ginormous tub of fish food was ordered for the reception area fish tank at work. It is HUGE! I don;t think we will ever need to purchase any more fish food because this will probably last until our office fish are long gone. It is a great price for such a large amount. NOTE: Only drawback in ordering this, is if you have pets...my dog freaked out and barked at the tub all weekend, and was afraid of it when i set it close to her on the floor! My guess is that she couldn't figure out the smell and why it was in a bucket.
customer_reviews.author: momma deer

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had been getting the smaller cans from my local store when I found this large container online. Not only has this saved me a TON of money, but it is also available on a subscription that gives discounts for being on the subscription. I would recommend this to anyone who has fish that love this food. It was shipped in a timely manner and packaged very well. I am a repeat customer here and will continue to get this as long as it stays cheaper than buying the smaller cans.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Really discolors aquarium orange!
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish seem to like this fish food just fine, but I noticed that unlike the last fish flakes we had, this one really discolor the water in the fish tank. The water turns orange within 2 feedings! I know the package says it should keep the water clear, but something is clearly wrong with the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: IF FISH COULD TALK.....
customer_reviews.text: If my fish could talk....they would say thank you ! They flood the top of my little fish pond....all 100 of them. I love feeding time-I get to see them up and active....and they consume all of the flakes. I also like the fact that it came in a plastic bucket and inside wrapped in a heavy plastic bag to keep it dry and fresh. Great buy for the price...it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA BOUCHER

customer_reviews.title: I love this kind of fish food
customer_reviews.text: My fish can easy eat them right when it hits the water, I find that I feel better feeding my fish these flakes than pallets because I worried that they may choke before it's being soaked well enough. Been feeding my goldfish these for like 1.5 years and they're healthy and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Tango

customer_reviews.title: My Koi and Goldfish love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my fishes this for a few years. It's super inexpensive and lasts me weeks. My fishes love it. The food particles floats and doesn't sink.
customer_reviews.author: Vu N.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I have big Koi which get pellets. They run about a foot long. Plus Japanese Shubunkins. I was surprised to find it on Amazon for a dollar cheaper! Plus free 2 day shipping! My goldfish have been on this for years! They are bright and colorful and it keeps the pond clear. But then again my fish gobble it up in about 2 minutes. Woo Hoo Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used successfully for hears
customer_reviews.text: I use this food for outdoor goldfish in a galvanized water trough. They have always eaten it well and have been eating it for almost 10 years with no ill effects that I can tell. I have about 20 goldfish and all but 2 have been happy, swimming around for 10 years. Not a bad mortality rate.
customer_reviews.author: Wet Paint

customer_reviews.title: Makes fish tank cloudy
customer_reviews.text: My fish seems to like it but ever since we switched to this, the water had been so cloudy. I actually went to the fish store trying to fix the water... but the guy told me it's the food. No matter how much I clean or change filter, if I continue with the same fish food it will be cloudy. Soooo i switched.
customer_reviews.author: NMirz

customer_reviews.title: Golden tilapias Love it ! ! ! highly recommended...
customer_reviews.text: Completely Satisfied... Delivered quick as scheduled. No problems with packaging n shipping. Great value. Bang for the buck. Quality & quantity a plus. A must buy. Works as advertised. Auto subscription every two months. Would highly recommend to family, friends, etc. 😀👍😀👍😀👍
customer_reviews.author: j0e

customer_reviews.title: Our fish gobble this up!
customer_reviews.text: Our fish seem to really like this food. We have goldfish in a small outdoor pond and the fish know when it is feeding time. They come out of hiding and practically bounce in the water when they see us. When we throw the food in the water, they gobble it up! The flakes are a nice size and seem to stay on top of the water for a long time. There is very little sinking. This size can lasts for a very long time too. The food does have a fishy smell but that is to be expected with fish food.
customer_reviews.author: DannyZplus3

customer_reviews.title: Nice big flakes
customer_reviews.text: Last few bottle of flakes I ordered from Amazon were super smelly and little broken up flakes. Opening this bigger container, there is no smell and the flakes are a nice size. My goldfish (and Koi) gobble this up. Will be the only food I order from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne C.

customer_reviews.title: My Koi Fish
customer_reviews.text: Since our Koi and gold fish have gotten a lot bigger, they like to eat a lot more. So, I came across this large container of fish food. It is a big container and will probably last a lot longer than buying the smaller containers. My fish seem to like this food just as much as the other food. I will reorder this food from now on provided it remains cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: First of all I just need to mention this, I actually laughed when I saw that there is a rating for flavor in this product. Do we have to taste it before feeding the fish? lol. But seriously, overall it’s surprisingly affordable. My fish loves them, gobbles them up right away. they look healthy and happy when i feed them
customer_reviews.author: yanxter

customer_reviews.title: TetraFin Goldfish Flakes
customer_reviews.text: My fish in my auquponics garden started out an inch long 5 years ago... They are now about 5 inches long. I tried changing to a less expensive fish food for them.. They developed white patches on their bodies and became very lethargic. So... I changed back to the TetraFin Flakes and they are again energetic and healthier looking. Poor fishies!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It's Goldfish food....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this without reading the size. I only have one goldfish. This canister is HUGE. I am pretty sure my fish will die before I run out of food. The flakes are bigger flakes so I just smash them with my fingers to make them smaller.
customer_reviews.author: SarahMonroe

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This can of food was waaaaay bigger that I thought it would be!!! Flakes are huge and much better than a can I bought at Wally World where 1/3 of the can was powder. EXCELLENT value for the money and our goldfish love it!
customer_reviews.author: Trying2getalong

customer_reviews.title: Wow great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge container of fish food! We refill a smaller one to make things easier! Normally our gold fish chew through a container, a month in and we have just touched the top half of the container! Will get months of feedings out of this!
customer_reviews.author: Cjy

customer_reviews.title: Not as clear as it says
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of fish for a lot of years now. This made my water cloudy in days. I will be sticking with the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: BladeRunner

customer_reviews.title: Huge container. Arrived perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I clearly didn't read the product description because I was SHOCKED when it arrived because it's a gigantic container! So I'm thrilled haha. I paid less for this than I usually pay for my container (not even an ounce) at Walmart. I wouldve paid over triple the cost for this in the store! I won't have to buy fish food for my sweet Jack and Victor for quite a long time after this :)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jane Conner

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The fish seem to enjoy it, I mean they haven't complained but I couldn't tell you if the taste is exquisite or just acceptable. Large container for a low price, it couldn't get any better than that! Will be back again for this
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Giant Thing of Flakes
customer_reviews.text: I just got some baby goldfish I have several typed of food I feed them including Sakura and floating pellets and Terta color enhancer occasionally. They seem fat and well fed and in good spirits. This thing is like a can of coffee. huge. totally worth the price I got it at amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good value, worth the hassle of size & design.
customer_reviews.text: Fish like it. Good value compared to store purchases. Smells fishy, so open infrequently and transfer to smaller containers for daily use. Awkward size & shape, making it more difficult to use than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Huge fish food
customer_reviews.text: This is huge for the $4 add on price! Get it. My goldfish love it and it has kept them alive and well for over two years now!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Miller

customer_reviews.title: Goldfish love it!
customer_reviews.text: My goldy tank (and plec) love this stuff! I noticed the last time I purchased this that there was an extra plastic bag inside to ensure freshness, so Its good to see the company is ever-improving. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Colton

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Petco
customer_reviews.text: Petco was out of this fish food so I had to get it on Amazon, where I happily noticed it was much cheaper. My goldfish gobble it up and it doesn't make my pond water all cloudy and gross if they don't finish it all. Auto-ship is super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: debra starr

customer_reviews.title: Fish love it
customer_reviews.text: This a great food for goldfish. Flakes are better than sticks because little fish (babies and teens) can eat it well. One package last about 2 weeks for 15 fish. Buying the 2.2 pound Hope it will last 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: B J Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Good all around fish food.
customer_reviews.text: I laughed about the star rating for flavor because I aint eating it! My fish seems to like it yhough so I gave it a five star rating. Great value and packaging was what I expected because I have bought this product before. All in all a product line I use and trust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fish is getting bigger and bigger.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got goldfish for Halloween present. I put it to a mason jar. and today I went to my friend's home and found the other fish which was given to my friend's daughter. and I couldn't believe Its size was very small. TetraFin is really good food for fish. one negative thing is Its smell. mmmm no good. -,.-
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kim

customer_reviews.title: My outdoor pond goldfish really love these flakes
customer_reviews.text: My outdoor pond goldfish really love these flakes. They get so excited when they see me in the morning and wait expectantly with their mouths wide open. I will keep buying these. They like these flakes much more than the hard pellets.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price and size
customer_reviews.text: This is the size to buy of you have Goldfish and don't want to run out to get new bottles of Goldfish food frequently. I was floored by how large this bottle was when it arrived. For the price, combined with Amazon Prime shipping and no tax, I paid a LOT less than at my local pet store or big named department store. My Goldfish readily eat this food...of course, when I put my hand in the tank to move my aquatic plants around a bit the Goldfish try to eat my hand, too, so I'm not sure if my Goldfish readily eating this food is a valuable endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: Mihalis in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Good amount for price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my land snails for their protein every week, I totally got way too much but that’s ok!! I wish you didn’t have to buy 2 containers as that is a pain .. Also: containers are so much bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fishes died.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fish food thinking that would be a good deal but was disappointed all my fish died in a few days I thought that maybe the fish was sick so I giving to my mom that have goldfish too, but in the instance she feeds her fishes one died too so I tell her put in the garbage cause have to be the food.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Cloudiest water ever!
customer_reviews.text: Product is advertised as Cleaner and Clearer water.I bought to alternate with frozen brine & blood work to be a bit more cost effective but my aquarium has never been so cloudy! I will stick to frozen foods!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great big bottle that lasts forever! I don't know about the flavor because I don't eat fish food but my goldfish seem to really love it! It does smell horrible, but again... my fish love it.
customer_reviews.author: JenSz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Can was much larger than I thought it would be! I have 3 gold fish and they are used to a different type of food but could not find it anywhere. I got this because of the price and they eat it like normal. They struggle just a little when they try to eat them off the surface so I break up the larger chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fish seem Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this fish food for a while now and my fish keep eating and growing. I started our with some small feeder fish and they are now large fish with babies every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: raymond howard

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Strange how less than 12 hours after feeding, all 3 of my goldfish are DEAD.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Halvorson

customer_reviews.title: Clumps together in automatic feeder
customer_reviews.text: I use a automatic feeder that sits over the that, most flakes I use do not clump together because of the moisture. This one clumps together, making it difficult to use in my automatic feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great value for size and price!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but our goldfish and tanks love this food. Clean tanks with regular cleaning and for the size and price here on Amazon a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Holtzman

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I get this product frequently, but this time the seal was broken and about 20% of the flakes were spilled inside the packaging bag. Disappointed that we lost some food and it made the container smell super fishy. The fish like it and it's a good value though.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: My fishes now love it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand my little goldfishs they don't eat it and water gets really unclear. I just want to update my review because after a few months now my finish love this food and they fight for it.
customer_reviews.author: Rayan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!!
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised at the size of this can when i received! Paid under three dollars for a huge can! Usually purchase at a pet store & pay more money for a teeny tiny can so i am a very happy customer.. 😊
customer_reviews.author: lajean

customer_reviews.title: Great value.!
customer_reviews.text: These are actually Huge cans of food. I thought they were going to be small but I bet there is at least a years worth of food between the 2 cans. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Zuess.

customer_reviews.title: Smells really strong
customer_reviews.text: Smells extremely offensive in my opinion. The water would get cloudy in just one day from the food. My goldfish always spit out the food and only lived for 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY

customer_reviews.title: My fish like this product!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say this is packed with flavor as obviously I don't eat this, my fish do. They seem very happy with this product and I am happy with the low cost. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish eat them up like it’s their last meal every time. They never complain or wish to “speak to the chef”. By far their favorite flakes. They live their life just waiting for the next time they get to taste the delicious flake of goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Rich and Jess P.

customer_reviews.title: My fish weren't interested
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I had a fish with swim bladder in my pond. I was hoping to avoid the gulping action of pellets and sprinkled these into my waterfall. Seemed like a good plan... Except my fish were rather uninterested in them and they just made debris in my pond.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Value but decomposes
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money however it really decomposes and dirties up the water, just wish there was a product that didn't fog the water up with food breakdown
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Killed my fish:(
customer_reviews.text: This food killed my fish after 2 days of feeding:( I had this gold fish for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Rom

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended! Great Product and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This product looks better then the stuff you buy from pet stores. The fish quickly gobble it from the Cichlid tank to the community tank. Price was one of the better ones on Amazon as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KISMET

customer_reviews.title: My fish love this food and the price is excellent
customer_reviews.text: My fish love this food and the price is excellent, as compared to pet store or retail prices. My only complaint is that the flake size is tiny--an amount this large handled in packing and shipping pulverizes the flakes. Other bulk fish foods, like Cobalt, manage to avoid this issue and the flake size seems much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Huge value compared to smaller containers. Way more in the package than you would think. It's densely packed in the container. Excellent for pond fish.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than you would think!
customer_reviews.text: This fish food container is gigantic!!! I was pleasabtly surprised that it was such a big container for so cheap. The fish seem to like it and I feel confident this will last me a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Tabconn

customer_reviews.title: A great money saver if you go through a lot of goldfish food
customer_reviews.text: If you have multiple goldfish that are larger than normal and are always voraciously hungry, buying this is a great money saver. I would say that this tub would give you at least 4-5 refills of a single 7.06-ounce container. It also saves you the hassle of continuously buying fish food because the food stays relatively fresh over a long period.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Happy Fish!
customer_reviews.text: I normal buy 1 ounce Tetra Flakes from my local store, the price I pay on average is $2.50. I can not believe I managed to find 7 ounces for such a ridiculously low price. It also included free shipping, and arrived less than 48 hours after I had placed my order. I have 3 Comet fish and they go completely nuts over this particular brand of fish food. I am a very very happy customer right now. I would imagine that this particular size will last me well over a year. Great service, great price, great product..... Happy fish!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Comley

customer_reviews.title: Tainted Fish-food killed my fish.
customer_reviews.text: All of my perfectly healthy fish died within a week after feeding them the food I bought off of Amazon. It's the same brand I normally get at Petsmart, but apparently Amazons source is tainted.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality food.
customer_reviews.text: Great product from Terta as usual. My fish love this food and they are healthy and growing huge. Fast shipping considering what's going on in the world right now.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: The price is good. The fish eat it enthusiastically
customer_reviews.text: The price is good. The fish eat it enthusiastically, have grown well on it and have good color. I don't know if they like it or not but when they see the container in my hand they come to the top of the pond. It is all they have ever eaten except for mosquitoes so I suppose they don't know if they like it either.
customer_reviews.author: DesertHowler

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a big container but this is way bigger that I was expecting! I was going to pay $6.49 for a 2.2 oz at Kroger but the I did my research and got a hell of a deal
customer_reviews.author: Georvanovic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to be able to purchase just one bottle of this fish food. Two bottles will probably outlast the fish. However, they are a decent value and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Wenrich

customer_reviews.title: Fish is nuts for this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Our goldfish freaks out when he gets these flakes! He loves them. They smell horrible so it must be legit fish product. Keep it tucked away when storing to prevent stench
customer_reviews.author: Fazio7

customer_reviews.title: I used  to buy 1 can of food of 7.6 once now i buy 1 very 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I like that is a very good product for my fish end is not that High price...🥰🤩 End I only buy it every 6 months food for my lovely Goodfish Guppies Dalmatian fish end all of them they are very colorful en Healthy thanks Amazon for sealing good products..
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Timing for my Fish
customer_reviews.text: Perfect timing! I had just ran out of fish food for my goldfish and black moor. This is the food that has kept my fish healthy for 6 years now! I'm very grateful!
customer_reviews.author: G. Guesby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value and awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product container is huge! I was expecting the tiny cans like you see at the pet store. My goldfish love it. No clouding and amazing price! I highly recommend this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Good brand. Did not come with the shaker top
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my pond fish. Keeps the water clean and the fish happy. Only complaint is that it did not have the shaker top as displayed in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Angiex57

customer_reviews.title: A repeat buy
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of these every year - year and a half for my fish. It's the best value I've found and the container it comes in is very convenient. I don't buy fish flakes anywhere else!
customer_reviews.author: L. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the fish alive and well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value for fish food. We've been feeding our fish with this stuff for more than a year now and they're doing well.
customer_reviews.author: k8

customer_reviews.title: Water anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm not a fish I can't tell you it taste great but it must because there eating it staying healthy and begging for more.
customer_reviews.author: Dewie

customer_reviews.title: Goldfish Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the larger size container as this is for my small goldfish pond outdoors with about 20 goldfish in it. They come up when I walk over just waiting to consume this feed!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: alot of fish food
customer_reviews.text: guys I ordered this tub of gold fish food.....................................yah it will probably last longer than the gold fish ! oops but hey I won't have to buy any more food for a few years lol
customer_reviews.author: Jsattler98

customer_reviews.title: Huge amount, lasted a year!
customer_reviews.text: Huge bucket last me almost a year. I have a 300 gallon pond with 1000 gold fish mix. They love it. I do mix with other stuff but this is good for the daily feed.
customer_reviews.author: binky

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Damaged through the mail!!! Flakes leaked out of canister and box.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've ordered it before! My sucker fish loves the flakes. BUT, BOX AND PACKAGE WAS DAMAGED AND THE MAIL LADY HAD IT IN A BAG BECAUSE THE FLAKES ALL LEAKED OUT! Not TetraFin fault. The mail lady marked it as DAMAGED. WOULD LIKE ANOTHER.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality and best price!
customer_reviews.text: I always trust Tetra Fish Food. This size is perfect for me, as I have large goldfish in my pond. This size should last a long time! Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Sewfisher

customer_reviews.title: I love that the huge bottle will last much longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that the huge bottle will last much longer than the ones I can get close to home. It doesn't fog up the water, which is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Fish love the flakes
customer_reviews.text: Our goldfish lived on Tetrafin food for over 10 years. Once we ordered tropical and they ate that until the large can was done, that's when we realized it was for tropical. Goldfish are very adaptive and can survive in the worst conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: The fish love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is much larger than I expected (7.06 oz). This should last a very long time with our 4 goldfish. The water doesn't seem to cloud as fast as our old fish food, but I am coming to grips with the fact that we might just have some dirty goldfish. The fish love it, no complaints from them!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lamonica

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good old bucket makes me feel like a mass breeder of goldfish (only have 2). This product is good, mix mine with bloodworms, baby shrimp, spirulina flakes, happy goldfish!
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. My fish seem to like it, but I don’t think they are to fussy. Large quantity will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: i wouldn’t buy any other fish food then tetra fin goldfish food my fish love it and it’s a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job, feeds fish. I'm not sure how I can comment on the flavor, but it must be OK because the fish eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Dusten O.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This container is HUgE I was NOt expecting this size for the money. Will last entire life of fish and then some!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A money saver!
customer_reviews.text: This bucket will last ages! I have a 55 gallon tank with 6 goldfish that are from 4-8 inches in size and when I would buy the smaller containers of flakes it seemed like I was always running out. These are the same flakes in the smaller container you can buy at the pet shop or walmart, just in bulk. I have never had issues with cloudy water when Feeding these flakes, and my fish gobble them up. Then again they will eat pretty much anything. It does not include scoop or anything so save a small container to sprinkle feed with if you have a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Winter Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish seem to really like this food, and their color is bright. It is also a good value for fish food.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver!
customer_reviews.text: We had been paying $8 for the approx. 7 oz container (the largest can) of this food at our local discount store. With this $24 (on Amazon Prime) tub, I found that I could refill that 7 oz can at least 5-6 times. I probably didn't pack it as tightly as the original, but still. That's less than half price for a little more effort; refilling the can from this tub is not a big deal. I use a scoop (or big spoon) and wide-mouth funnel, so I don't make a mess. It takes 2 minutes. I definitely recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MSVixen

product_meta.title: TetraFin Balanced Diet Goldfish Flake Food for Optimal Health
product_meta.description:
Size:2.2-OunceTetra Goldfish Flakes are a nutritionally complete daily diet for all goldfish and small koi Ideal for use in aquariums and outdoors in small ponds too This scientifically developed mix of highly nutritious ingredients plus vitamins minerals and trace elements will enhance your fish’s naturally brilliant colors Includes patented health-enhancing ProCare formula to help support your fish’s immune system for optimal health and long life This precise blend of immunostimulants vitamins biotin and omega-3 fatty acids is custom designed to strengthen a fish’s resistance to disease and stress Feed your goldfish two to three times daily only as much as your fish can consume within several minutes Tetra brand’s flake food formulations have been designed to be easily digested by fish and not to leach color helping to keep aquarium water clean and clear when used as directed Since 1951 Tetra has developed the world’s most comprehensive body of fish food knowledge and fishkeeping enthusiasts have looked to the brand for products and solutions that add ease and beauty to their home Whether you're an experienced hobbyist or just starting out Tetra has everything you need – from a large variety of quality fish food and innovative equipment to test kits and decor

AMAZON.COM


QUALITY NUTRITION FOR GOLDFISH
Tetra has been revolutionizing and improving fish nutrition since the company’s birth in Germany in 1951. Since that time, Tetra has developed one of the most comprehensive bodies of flake fish food knowledge in the world. A full team of biologists, chemists, and nutritionists continually study and discover what keeps fish thriving and living long, healthy lives.

TETRAFIN GOLDFISH FLAKES
TetraFin Goldfish Flakes provide a nutritionally balanced diet perfect for all goldfish. This scientifically developed flake blend includes highly nutritious ingredients plus vitamins, minerals, and trace elements. Patented ProCare works to support immune system health for a long and happy life. TetraFin Flakes are highly digestible—meaning less waste and cleaner, clearer water when used as directed.

CLEAN, CLEAR WATER
Tetra formulas feature micro milled, exotic, high-protein fish meal as a core ingredient—making them pure and digestible with fewer colorants. This leads to less waste and a cleaner, clearer aquarium.

PICK THE TETRAMIN THAT'S RIGHT FOR YOUR FISH
TetraFin Goldfish Flakes Nutritionally balanced staple diet provides optimal health. TetraFin PLUS Goldfish Flakes All the benefits of TetraFin with added algae for maximum health. TetraFish Goldfish Crisps Advanced TetraFin for reduced waste and maximum nutrition. TetraColor Slow Sinking Goldfish Granules A perfect supplement to your goldfish’s primary diet. Contain Spirulina maxima algae for the development of vibrant colors. TetraFin Floating Variety Pellets Nutritionally balanced, highly attractant staple diet. Patented ProCare formula supports immune system health. TetraFin Sinking Mini Sticks Provides additional supplementation to your fish’s primary diet. Promote the development of rich color in exotic cold-water varieties. WORLD CLASS MENU FOR EVERY FISH TYPE
Tetra understands that every fish is unique. For this reason, they have created a full menu of food to help meet the needs of every fish; from bottom feeders to top-feeders and small Bettas to Large Cichlids.

Flakes: Flakes make up the most popular type of fish food. Tetra flakes are formulated to keep water clean and clear and include ProCare for added health benefits.

Crisps: Tetra crisps float longer and create less waste. Crisps are ideal for small and medium-sized fish.

Granules: Bite-sized morsels sink slowly to reach all fish in your aquarium, including mid-water feeders.

Tablets: Tablets are complete, balanced nutrition that sink quickly for all bottom-feeding fish such as catfish and loaches.

Algae Wafers: Large, sinking wafers are perfect for veggie loving bottom feeders like piecostomus catfish.

Sticks: Complete and balanced sticks provide hearty nutrition to larger fish such as Oscars, Cichlids, and marine fish.

Pellets: This floating food is ideal for mid to large sized fish like Cichlids and Goldfish. Tiny pellets are available for Bettas.

Gel Foods: Innovative Grazing Blocks are great for long periods away from home. Gel Foods strive to feed fish the way they would eat in nature.

Supplements/Treats: Great in conjunction with Tetra’s Primary diets, these foods provide healthy variety for fish.
feature_bullets: This special ProCare formula meets all nutritional requirements of cold-water fish and will stay firm when fish strike.
Procare is a health-enhancing blend containing omega-3 fatty acids
A scientifically-developed blend that's easily digested
